root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Eternal Duelist Soul
root.description: OverviewYu-Gi-Oh! The Eternal Duelist Soul is a card battling game developed and published by Konami for the Game Boy Advance platform.GameplayYu-Gi-Oh! The Eternal Duelist Soul mostly follows the physical Yu-Gi-Oh! rules of the time of the games release. The only difference is how the side deck works.
